name: Super Fireballs 3D
description:
Hold the finger to fire balls, and tap faster if you like to keep firing at faster rate.

Super Fire Ball 3D takes you on a journey you will never forget. A colorful world of happiness.
Game is carefully designed to make you feel better even when you lose the points. It helps fight back psychological tensions and in return you feel happy and relieved.
Super Fireballs 3D is set in a beautiful environment to ease off your worries and get absorbed by the game.

Game has unlimited levels to craft your hunger for more and more game play time.

How to Play:

* Tap on the screen to Fire Balls
* Combine Power by Destroying Tiles
* Use the powers to destroy obstacles
